songs.title: In Luv With U
songs.lyrics:
I didn't want to get into this
I was just hoping to have a good time
What can I do I'm in love with you, tonight
With just one touch and played all my keys
You shoot me off like a roller coaster
What can I do I'm in love with you tonight
Now you're the only one I need
To be by my side
I know you're the one for me
Tonight, tonight
Now every minute I need your kiss

You got me feeling like a little child
What can I do I'm in love with you, tonight
Maybe tomorrow will never be
Maybe this moment can last a lifetime
Whatever happens its all fine by me
Cause I'm in love with you can't you see
I really figure youre the one for me, tonight
Now you're the only one I need to be by my side
I know, you're the only one I need
To be by my side
I know you're the one for me
Tonight, tonight
